Package BodyCollisions

Class iceDemonCollide

java.lang.Object
BodyCollisions.iceDemonCollide
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class iceDemonCollide
extends java.lang.Object
implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
Create a new listener interface to allow the IceDemon creatures to move between the set boundaries in the world.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    iceDemonCollide​(Platform platform, IceDemon iceDemon)
    Initialise a new CollisionListener involving the IceDemon and Platform bodies

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void collide​(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
    Receives and responds to collisions when the IceDemon interacts with specific types of platforms, changing their directional movement every time a collision is record between a platform/boundary.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • collide

      public void collide​(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)

      Receives and responds to collisions when the IceDemon interacts with specific types of platforms, changing their directional movement every time a collision is record between a platform/boundary.
